campaign.story:
¡Primera meta alcanzada! 240K / First goal reached! 240K
Gracias a ustedes hemos juntado los primeros $240,000 y Fridis será una realidad. Queremos agradecerles todo su apoyo con más sorpresas. ¡Estén pendientes para conocer nuestras siguientes metas en la campaña!
Thanks to you we’ve reached our first goal and Fridis will become a reality. We want to thank you all for the great support with more surprises. Stretch goals are on the way!
     ¡Todos nuestros backers que apoyaron con $400 MXN o más obtienen una pulsera de ambar! ¡Tenemos dos modelos a elegir y varios colores diferentes!
All of our backers that pledged $400MXN or more get an Amber bracelet! we have two different designs and colors for you to choose from! 
      En el 2006 habían mas de 5 millones de artesanos en el país, hoy en día quedan menos de la mitad. ¿Por qué no unir nuestras tradiciones y artesanías con las nuevas tecnologías y así ayudar a toda una comunidad?. 
In 2006 there were more than 5 millions artisans in our country, today, there are less than a half. Why not put together customs and crafts with new technologies and help an entire community.
Nosotros estamos en Chiapas, uno de los estados más pobres de la Républica Mexicana, y debido a la situación financiera, artesanos chiapanecos que anteriormente se dedicaban a crear piezas artísticas, han estado luchando para seguir haciendo lo que tanto aman hacer. 
We are located in Chiapas, one of the poorest states in Mexico, and due to the current financial situation, local artisans who previously dedicated their life to create art, have been struggling to keep doing what they love to do.
Su trabajo ya no es bien pagado. La gente no le da el reconomiento que merecen, quieren pagar menos por artesanías porque piensan que es fácil, ignoran el trabajo duro y valor de las creaciones de nuestros artesanos, por eso, estos son obligados a buscar otras alternativas para seguir manteniéndose ellos y a sus familias. A este paso, ya no veremos su arte en los años futuros.
Their work isn't well paid anymore. People don’t give their art the recognition they deserve, they want to pay less for handicrafts because they think it’s easy, they ignore the hard work and value of our artisans creations, so they are forced to look for other alternatives to sustain themselves. At this rate, we probably won’t see their art anymore in the next years to come.
¡Queremos que las artesanías vuelvan a tener la misma popularidad de antes! Nuestro equipo puede imprimir en 3D, los artesanos pueden volver un simple objeto en una hermosa y única pieza de arte. Y así es como nació Fridis, unimos la tecnología moderna y las técnicas ancestrales de pintado de nuestro país. 
We want to bring handicrafts into the spotlight again! Our team can 3D print, the artisans can turn any boring object into a beautiful and one of a kind piece of art. And that’s how Fridis was born, teaming up modern technology and ancestral painting techniques.
Hemos diseñado un Art Toy inspirado en la artista Frida Kahlo*, a la que utilizaremos como lienzo para plasmar el arte de 10 artistas y pintores más reconocidos de la historia del arte. Kandinsky, Picasso, Andy Warhol, Salvador Dalí, Magritte, Claude Monet, Edvard Munch, Jackson Pollock, Van Gogh y Frida Kahlo. Con la ayuda y el talento de los artesanos Chiapanecos daremos vida a la primera colección de Art Toys impresos en 3D y pintados a mano. 
We have designed an art toy inspired by the artist Frida Kahlo, the one we will use as a canvas to portrait the art of 10 of the most famous and recognized artists and painters in the history of art. Kandinsky, Picasso, Andy Warhol, Salvador Dalí, Magritte, Claude Monet, Edvard Munch, Jackson Pollock,Van Goh and Frida Kahlo. With the help and talent of artisans from Chiapas, we will bring to life the first collection of 3D printed and hand painted Art Toys.
      ¡Todas nuestras Fridis vienen en un mismo tamaño! 
All of our Fridis come in one size!
Excepto... la Fridis Surrealista 1955
Except... Surrealist Fridis 1955
    Para meternos en el espíritu de este gran proyecto, creamos playeras y stickers para nuestros backers y mostrar con orgullo lo que el talento y la tecnología pueden hacer para preservar nuestra herencia cultural.
To get into the spirit of this awesome project, we have created T-Shirts and Stickers for our backers and show with pride what talent and technology can do to preserve our cultural heritage with backer’s help. 
Render
  Render. Real photos coming soon.
¡Pero si tú eres una persona más elegante, también tenemos algo para ti! Nuestro dije de oro de 14k. 
Are you a fancy person? we have something for you too! our 14k gold pendant! 
         Nosotros somos Toy Artisans, un equipo multidisciplinario conformado por 6 personas, unidos por un mismo fin: preservar nuestra herencia cultural plasmada en las artesanías a través de la integración de nuevas técnicas y herramientas digitales. Nuestro equipo nace por la necesidad de volver a mostrar al mundo el talento de nuestros artesanos Chiapanecos, ya que su trabajo está siendo olvidado y mal pagado. Pero también queríamos abrir el panorama a nuestros artesanos y mostrarles nuevas alternativas para utilizar su talento y técnica en la pintura.
We are Toy Artisans, a multi-disciplinary team made up by 6 people, united by the same goal: to preserve our cultural heritage drawn in our handicrafts through the integration of new techniques and digital tools. Our team was born by the necessity of showing the world the talent of the artisans from our state, because their work has been forgotten and poorly payed, but also, we wanted to open the limits to our artisans and show them new alternatives to use their talents and techniques in painting.
 Recompensa 1 - GRACIAS!!! 
Recompensa 2 - Playera Fridis! - Fridis T-Shirt 
Recompensa 3: 1 Fridis (Super Early Bird)
Recompensa 4:  1 Fridis (Early Bird)
Recompensa 5: 1 Fridis
Recompensa 6: 3 Fridis + Playera - T-Shirt (Early Bird)
Recompensa 7: 3 Fridis + Playera - T-Shirt
Recompensa 8: 5 Fridis (Early Bird)
Recompensa 9: 5 Fridis
Recompensa 10: 10 Fridis
Recompensa 11: 10 Fridis + 2 Playeras (2 T-Shirt)
Recompensa 12: Colección completa + 2 Playeras + Stickers + Un dije de oro de 14K del logo de Fridis - Complete Collection + 2 T-shirts + One 14K gold pendant of Fridis Logo
Recompensa 13: Colección completa + 2 playeras + Tour exclusivo - Complete Collection + 2 T-shirts + Exclusive Tour
 Rudy: Es el cerebro y guía del equipo, en pocas palabras nuestro maestro Roshi. 
Cheryl: Nuestra modeladora experta en 3D, concibe cada uno de nuestros bocetos e ideas, sin ella nada se haría realidad. (Sheng Long) 
Blas: Señor Doctor Profesor impresor 3D José Luis Blas hace realidad todas las creaciones a través de la tecnología. 
Gladys: Líder de los artesanos, le da color y el toque final a todas nuestras creaciones. 
Claret: Diseñadora, fotógrafa y post-productora del equipo. Transmite la esencia de nuestro proyecto al público y nos hace ver muy cool. 
Citlali: Conocida en el bajo mundo como “La Güera”, sin ella todos fuéramos un desastre, además de imprimirle sabor a nuestras vidas con sus Cup Cakes, hace de nuestro caos un concierto de producción 3D. No sabemos qué haríamos sin ella.
MEET THE TEAM
Rudy: He is the brains and mentor of the team, long story short, he is our Master Roshi.   
Cheryl: Our 3D modeler expert, she conceives each and everyone of our sketches and ideas, without her, our projects would not be possible.  
Blas: Mister Doctor Profesor 3D printer guy makes reality all of our creations through technology.   
Gladys: Leader of the artisans, she gives color and the final touch to our creations.  
Claret: Designer, photographer and post-producer of the team. She transmits the essence of our project to the public and makes us look awesome.  
Citlali: Best known as “La güera”(The blondie), without her we would be a mess, aside from giving a sweet taste to our lives with her CupCakes, she makes our chaos a 3D production concert. We don’t know where we would be without her.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
A pesar de estar seguros con los plazos de producción, siempre puede
haber imprevistos, uno de ellos es el tiempo de pintado de las Fridis,
debido a que todo es pintado a mano y cada pieza es
única, este tiempo puede variar.
Otro riesgo a considerar es el tiempo de entrega por parte de la paquetería ya que se han presentado movimientos sociales en nuestra ciudad, los cuales pueden retrasar los tiempos estimados de entrega.
Por último el precio del dólar Americano frente al peso podría llegar a incrementar los costos del material de impresión 3D. 

No importa que imprevistos enfrentemos, mantendremos informados a nuestros backers.

Despite of being confident with production dates, there's always a chance for unforeseen challenges, one of them being the time it takes to paint each Fridis, every piece is unique,so time can vary.
Another challenge to consider is the delivery time, since there has 
been social movements in our city, the estimated delivery time can be delayed.
One last risk is the price of the U.S. dollar. Since we buy the 3D printing material in dollars, if the peso loses value we would have to deal with the difference in price. 

No matter what unforeseen challenges we endure, we will keep our backers inform at all times.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello dear backers
We started shipping to Mexico, Europe and USA a few days ago, but we discovered some issues at the information we used to send some of your packages. We made some mistakes sending them wrong and duplicated, so now we are producing again our fridis in order to send Everything, is our comitment to send Everything ok, so again we want to tell you we are sorry, in the next two weeks we are going to be able to send some other packages, we know you want yo receive your fridis and we are working with that.

We started shipping a few weeks ago and we have some issues with some of our backers becauSe some are receiving diferent fridis , please send us a Message if something is wrong or of its ok.
Muchas gracias!

Hola, sabemos del enorme retraso que tenemos en nuestros envíos, pero ya estamos preparando toda la logística para hacerlo.
Estamos integrando recompensas y vamos a iniciar a la brevedad con los primeros envíos, agradecemos toda su paciencia!

ESP / ENG
¡Holaaaa! Sabemos que ha pasado un tiempo y estamos retrasados con la fecha de envío, pero tuvimos algunos problemas que no pensamos que tendríamos. Tenemos tantas impresoras 3D que imprimir todas las Fridis fue pan comido... ¡Pero! Sólo tenemos una máquina que da el toque final a las piezas (acetonadora), y nos tomó muchísimos días terminar esa parte de la producción. Sabemos que fue nuestro error por no pensar en ese detalle así que nos disculpamos por eso... Estamos muy tristes porque no pudimos iniciar con los envíos en marzo, pero ahora, estamos muy cerca de terminarlo. Tenemos las playeras, las pulseras, cajas, y los artesanos nos dijeron que terminarán de pintar todas las Fridis este viernes! Así que el envío empezará muy muy pronto. Estamos muuuy felices, este ha sido un hermoso viaje, aprendimos muchas cosas gracias a ustedes. Nunca dejaremos de agradecerles por creer en nosotros y en México! Los queremos! Ahora, sabemos que una imagen habla mas que mil palabras, les dejamos muchas fotos!!

ESP/ENG
¡Hola, Backers! Estamos muy contentos de darles una actualización de las cosas en las que hemos estado trabajando. 
Después de recibir el dinero de Kickstarter, ordenamos todo el filamento que necesitamos para que pudiéramos empezar producción, (tomaron algo de tiempo en llegar) y tenemos 20 impresoras trabajando muy duro para hacer mas de 300 Fridis.

updates.update_userinfo: ¡Cuestionarios, tallas y pulseras! // Surveys, T-Shirt Sizes, Bracelet's shapes and colors!
updates.update_content:
ESP / ENG
¡¡Hola a todos!! Queremos darles un resumen de lo que hemos estado haciendo estas ultimas semanas.
Hemos estado trabajando en la logística para el pintado de las Fridis y acordar un método de trabajo cómodo para los artesanos y para nosotros también. Hemos estado buscando el lugar que sirva como nuestro taller de pintado y buscando al artesano que nos ayude a hacer el empaque para las piezas.

ESP/ENG
¡Hola! Solo nos quedan 4 días para finalizar nuestra campaña y debemos alcanzar dos stretch goals más. Confiamos en que podemos hacerlo si nos ayudan, compartiendo el proyecto con sus amigos en Facebook ¡o en cualquier otra red social!. De verdad queremos que la Fridis edición Kickstarter se haga realidad y regalar Mini Fridis llaveros a nuestros backers!.

campaign.story:
Katherine Sabbath - Greatest Hits - The Pop Edition
Hey there pals! My name is Katherine Sabbath. I’m a high school History and Geography teacher, a proud home baker and passionate merrymaker from Sydney, Australia. I need your help to launch my most exciting project yet. An entertaining, interactive, visually stunning and incredibly practical idea which will enrich and support our creative and home baking community, WORLDWIDE!
Photo by Chrissie Hall
Due to overwhelming support on social media (thank you!) I’ve since moved on from high school teaching - nearly two years ago now - to focus on the ‘Cake Life’ full time, by teaching cake workshops, recipe developing and baking as many people’s days as I can! Throughout this journey, I’ve been taking good notice and it’s becoming more and more apparent that many lovely people have been asking for a cookbook! So, I’ve devoted my next chapter of ‘Cake Life’ to honour this request for a book and ensure that it not only meets the needs of us home baking enthusiasts, but surpasses all of your expectations.
Since 2013, I’ve been working on this idea, and then, at the beginning of 2016, I joined creative forces with a highly talented Sydney-based team to finally bring my vision to life, and its even better than what I envisaged…Testimony to the power of creative collaboration! Our project has been conceptualised, designed, created and tested right here in Sydney, Australia! I’d love to introduce you to our team of cool cats:
Tracy Lines: Creative Director, Publishing Consultant & Producer
Benja Harney AKA Paperform: Artist & master of paper engineering
Nikki To: Renowned food photographer & my best friend
Alicia Sciberras: Stylist & my hometown friend
Jeremy Shaw: Videographer & my legend-of-a-mate
And me, Katherine Sabbath! The author, recipe developer & teacher.
As a team, we’re bringing you an interactive, entertaining, and immersive 3-dimensional ‘book’. This is most definitely not your ‘traditional’ cookbook! It’s a POP UP ART BOOK (yippie!) which also contains a full set of comprehensive RECIPE CARDS. This enables you to happily cook and make a good ol’ mess whilst keeping your beautiful book all sparkly clean. Home bakers will be able to recreate all of my most well-known cakes & recipes (hence the name, Greatest Hits!). The high-quality recipe cards are designed, for functional, everyday use in the kitchen, whilst the book itself is a beautiful art piece. Every cake featured also comes with it's own story, revealing my inspiration behind each creation. A keepsake of dessert inspiration and paper engineering to both admire and display!
Work by Benja Harney for Arjo Wiggins & Kylie Minogue
  I share my passion by teaching workshops, hosting cake demonstrations and sharing my recipes, ideas and tips online. Making a book of my own and sharing the process of it with others seemed like a natural progression. As a team, we are challenging the conventions of traditional cookbooks and through creative collaboration have come up with a unique and original publication, with which we’re very proud! I have cherished the opportunity to work with some of my closest friends and talented local creatives. Thus, crowdfunding felt like a natural fit in this process, where you too can be part of this journey. I view this whole process, and the possibilities it is creating as a huge privilege and am proud to know that as a team, we’re bringing something fantastic to life, from start to finish. And of course, we’d love to share this with you!
Friends, please help us change the way we experience home baking and traditional cookbooks. Let’s enrich both the home baking and the creative community with this one-of-a-kind publication. Please support our pop-up cookbook, Katherine Sabbath - Greatest Hits - The Pop Edition, which with YOUR much needed help, we hope to publish very soon!
    Cost of book $65 whilst on Kickstarter (RRP $80)
Estimated weight approx 1300g
Size - 215 x 254mm (portrait)
Hardback with accordian fold binding
Printed on highest quality heavy 250 gsm matt paper
80 pages (40 x spreads) 10 paper engineered pop ups and 40 x grease-proof recipe cards
Images below only display the first prototype dummy.
Below: The first coloured pop-up prototype, paper engineered by Benja Harney of Paperform. This is just our first mock-up... You ain't seen nothin' yet!
PLAY

  Cookbooks are expensive to produce. Moreover, every single one of these cookbooks is a hand-assembled, 3-dimensional publication, featuring paper engineering of exceptional quality. Our goal of $227,000 for a first print run of 5,000 copies will cover:
  Thank you SO much to everyone who has helped support our book so far! In order to share the joys of the "Cake Life" even further, we would love to produce 10,000 copies of Katherine Sabbath - Greatest Hits - The Pop Edition. In order to do this, our stretch goal is : $335,000  
      To reduce your costs, I have worked extra, EXTRA hard over the past year and put all of my money into savings in order to pay for:
7 months worth of wages (the amount of time I’ve spent so far in bringing this unbelievable project to life)
Ingredients (for testing and re-testing of all recipes)
Tools, kitchen equipment and decorating supplies
Project management support
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have already made a number of prototypes of the book to make sure the paper engineering, printing, binding, recipe cards and covers turn out to our unique specifications. We will have the first edition produced by a leading printing house and the process will be supervised closely by our team. We have hired the most reputable and timely printers and distributors to mitigate all potential risks. The books will be shipped to a third party logistics company that will manage global logistics. We have also built enough buffer into our timeline to allow for delays and to ensure timely delivery. However, if we encounter an unexpected challenge and are running behind schedule, you will be the first to know.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey lovely friends,
I am very happy to see via my AfterShip tracking account that 64% of books have now been delivered! YIPPIE! Thank you so kindly for sharing your photos with me on Instagram and Facebook! It truly means so much to know you are loving your pop-up cookbooks! :)

What I would like to quickly address though, are the shipping delays and substandard packaging. It deeply pains me to type this, but last week we discovered that our fulfilment company based in Hong Kong, Floship, shipped our books out in the wrong packaging. As you know, our book team and I have taken great care in ensuring this book is of the highest quality we could possibly afford (and a lot more, including a scary amount of personal debt... But maybe this is a story for another time). We are genuinely SO PROUD of this beautiful product and I truly hope it will be a delightful keepsake in your home and kitchen!

Floship have been made WELL aware of this issue and we are waiting for their response about ways in which they can reimburse backers for damages caused. Thankfully, the majority of books have been delivered in lovely condition, but if you have any concerns about your book, please email us at kickstarter@katherinesabbath.com

If you're wondering about the double spine of the book, it's supposed to be there! This ingeniously allows the pop-ups to function fully and provides the range of expansion that the spine of a traditional book is unable to provide.

As for delays, we’re now at the mercy of the carrier companies and their delivery times are beyond our control. There seems to be lag times in tracking updates too, but please rest assured that all of your books are being tracked through AfterShip.

You may find this hilarious and/or slightly sad, but aside from my advanced copy from our printers, even I haven't received my books yet! Hahaha, and yes, I bought multiple copies of my own book for myself (no free rides here unfortunately, LOL). I promise you though, your books are coming!

Hey there awesome backers!

I thought I'd let you know, THE FIRST PROOF OF THE BOOK IS COMING!! I have butterflies throwing up in my stomach every time I think about it.

There are three parts to this unique publication: The book itself, the pop-ups, & the recipe cards. We won't be satisfied unless all three elements are perfect in their own right, as well as work harmoniously as one, fully-functioning book. I'm confident the first proof is going to blow mind grapes, but we'll only know for sure once it comes back to the team & I as a tangible thing (& we each beat it around the kitchen for a while).

campaign.story:
The Collection was inspired by the flawed approach society uses to address people with ADD and ADHD; alternatives needed to be explored. Our goal is to stimulate senses through fidgeting to help improve focus. These beautifully crafted solid pieces have been designed to optimize double-tasking and feel damn good doing it.  
Fidget to focus... Wtf?
Experts say that fidgeting increases focus on the primary task at hand. The idea behind effective fidgeting is having something stimulating and soothing- but in no way a distraction. The D I D G E T S Collection are not toys; instead they are simple solid tools that work with you to maintain focus on whatever is important to you in life. And they're hella fun.
Are they for me??
They are for people with ADD, ADHD, anxiety, creatives, allies, every tier of the corporate ladder, hardcore/ lightweight fidgeters, students, design junkies, thinkers... Anyone who lives in this era of computer screens and limited attention spans... 
In short, The D I D G E T S Collection is for: you, me and everyone we know. 
 The Rollers
Roll them infinitely in one hand 
Rub-roll them together in both hands 
    The Cubix
Click the pleasure button 
Push-pull the copper wand 
Rub the worry stone and breathe 
    The Squishy
Clap them 
Bounce them 
Jiggle them 
Lock them closed to create the Porta-ball 
    At the end of the day, there’s no one way to fidget. 
We know option is important. You do you, your way.
                  
                                                                                                                                                  Belen is a designer with ADHD and has been scolded her whole life because she thinks differently. So, she flipped everyone the bird and became an experiential/ product designer; utilizing her difference by inciting social change around the attitudes and misconceptions people have about ADHD.
Rachael is a writer/ filmmaker/ sales kween/ social vigilante... She's had to adapt her life many times after having both feet reconstructed, relearning how to walk (twice) and having recurring physical setbacks. Rachael thinks being labeled an 'invalid' or 'disabled' sux big time and is so over being made to feel that way.
We don't just want to make another fidget toy for the ADD and ADHD community; we want people to own their weird and feel great about it. Suck on that, 'normal'.
      Free WEB APP
  3D print digital files + Instructions
  Sass Totes
                                                                 Yes! We love both of these materials and there are benefits and considerations to each. Be part of the discussion and help us decide what material you'd rather hold in your hand. 
Marble is a handsome natural material; that is more difficult to sculpt and has a fragility factor. 
Corian has the weight and style of marble; and it's easier to mold so has the capability to unlock alternative color options- stretch goals. It is the more expensive material.
We will upload a full Benefits/ Considerations table during our campaign and look forward to your deliberations! Join the convo here.
  These solid, ultra-dense and durable materials will last forever, for even the most ardent fidgeter, if proper care is taken.
            Because we are vehemently over the infantilization of: ADD, ADHD and the stigma of every other adult and child that has a mind wired to fidget. 
As the sometimes wise Yeezus said "name one genius that ain't crazy".
Ummm… This reminds me of the Kickstarter for Fidget Cube, are you copying them? 
No. The idea of fidgeting to focus is not a new one and we have been developing our lux line, with extensive research and the help of neurologists, neuroscientists, psychologists long before their release. Belen chose to document her research in the public sphere in order to encourage feedback and to keep the conversation of fidgeting and focus inclusive and progressive. 
So, they copied you? 
We hope not. But at the end of the day it’s awesome to see such a large response from the community and that, in itself, has been very validating. We have also designed lux products, focused on materiality because we believe that a smooth, cooling, solid weight is a crucial part of the design. So, we have different goals in mind.
Sooo many great articles, interviews and journals to check out through Belen’s book below or, if you wanna learn more, check out the verse on the D I D G E T S website.
Thesis Book, Re-mind: Re-evaluating ADD & ADHD in a quick fix society
 UN BESO GRANDE PARA:
Reem and Liam of Heavy - check out their tunes and vibe here (so good) 
Anapaula - the sweetheart sister 
Hilary - the kind and patient housemate 
Victor - the good dude photographer
Isi and Marcus - The sexy D I D G E T wigglers
Thor & Juliana - The hand fidgeters
Adam Fujita - The amazing maker
Amal - The fab programmer
And of course you! THANK YOU so much for your support. Share this with all the awesome weirdos in your life and take a moment to step back and celebrate how your differences make you a better and more interesting person. We look forward to hearing whether you wanna fidget with marble or corian.
X

campaign.story:
Hello! My name is J.A. Borboa, I'm a mexican designer and illustrator. I have previously participated in the development of comic and children's books. This is my second coloring book after “The path to Mictlan”. This time, after 7 months of work, I made a Bestiary that is ready to be colored.
¡Hola! Soy J.A. Borboa diseñadora e ilustradora mexicana. He participado en el desarrollo de comics y cuentos infantiles. Este es mi segundo libro para colorear después de "El Camino a Mictlán". Esta vez se trata de un Bestiario que después 7 meses de trabajo, ya está listo para ser coloreado.
What is a Bestiary? It is a collection of monsters and/or beasts that generally comes with a description.
¿Qué es un Bestiario? Es una colección de Monstruos o Bestias que viene generalmente acompañado de una descripción.
Bestiary Coloring Book
About the project
Bestiary is a coloring book with 61 illustrated pages and a description of each monster that lives in it. The illustrations are handmade paying attention to every detail.
It is not just a simple coloring book, it is your own monster collection.
The book size is 5”x 8”
The paper is 100% white
61 illustrated handmade pages made by pencil and ink
Cover with matte finish Monster's documentation
Acerca del Proyecto 
Se trata de un libro para colorear con 61 páginas ilustradas y con una pequeña investigación de los monstruos que habitan en el bestiario. Cada ilustración fue hecha a mano poniendo especial atención en cada detalle.
No es un simple libro para colorear, es tu propia colección de monstruos.
El libro es de 5x8 pulgadas de papel completamente blanco.
61 páginas ilustradas a mano con lápiz y tinta
Cubierta con acabado matte
Documentación de los monstruos
 Where does my money go?
At the end of the crowdfunding campaign the money will be used to make the books and the rewards. The ultimate goal is to sell the books in libraries all around the world and keep on making original content with high quality standards.
¿A dónde va mi dinero?
Al terminar el fondeo se imprimirán y enviarán los libros junto con las recompensas. El objetivo último es colocar el libro en librerías alrededor del mundo y seguir generando contenido original y de alta calidad.
Tell me more
The monsters’ legends are as old as humankind itself, I believe they come from our necessity to express emotions and fears; to give moral lessons; or to explain the unexplainable.
I am fascinated by them because they allow us to imagine beyond the possible and yet they are completely human. That is why I compile monsters in my own way; some are scarier than others and some are even funny. I have always had the inquietude to put them in paper and make a collection. I'm curious to see how each person interprets them through color. You can have your own exclusive monster version.
I made a research of each monster within the book, I found their origins and their main characteristics so I could draw the more accurate version, if that's even possible. Of course, I added some grace into them. I hope you enjoy coloring this book as much as I enjoyed making it.
Cuéntame más
Los monstruos son parte de la humanidad, nos ayudan a manifestar miedos, ansiedades, a dar lecciones morales o dar explicaciones a lo inexplicable.
Me encantan porque nos permiten imaginar y crear más allá de lo humano, sin dejar de ser intrínsecamente humanos. Por eso a lo largo de mi vida recopilo monstruos a mi manera, unos son más macabros que otros; unos hasta dan risa. Siempre he tenido la inquietud de plasmarlos en papel y tener una colección. Me parece súper interesante que esta colección se personalice a través del color. Cada quien puede tener su propia versión de sus monstruos.
Hice una investigación de cada uno de los monstruos en el libro, encontrando sus orígenes y sus características más importantes para así poder dibujar la versión que creo que es más acertada, si eso es posible. Claro, poniendo un poco de mi cosecha.
Ilustrar este libro e investigar sobre todas estas leyendas fue muy entretenido y enriquecedor, espero que lo disfruten tanto como yo.
The plan
The objective is to collect USD $1,500. From this money 61% will be used to make the books and the rewards and distribution. 20% will be destined to pay the artistic work and the logistics; 5% will be used to pay marketing and publicity; 10% is for Kickstarter commissions; finally 4% is going to be used as contingency money.
Work started since april 2016, when the idea started to get shape.
Timeline:
April: Concept and logistics
May: Research and sketching
June-July-August: Illustration with pencil and ink
September: Digitalization and edition
October: Printing proofs and prototype
November-December: Crowdfunding and shipment logistics
January: Shipping of books and rewards
El plan
El objetivo es juntar USD $1,500, de ese dinero 61% será destinado para producción de libros y recompensas y distribución. El 20% será para pagar el trabajo artístico y de planeación; el 5% será para gastos de marketing y publicidad; el 10% es para las comisiones de kickstarter-fondeadora y por último el 4% será para emergencias en caso de tener algún problemilla.
El trabajo empezó desde abril del 2016 donde la idea empezó a tomar forma.
Timeline:
Abril: Concepto y planeación
Mayo: investigación y bocetos
Junio-Julio-Agosto: Ilustración a lápiz y entintado
Septiembre: Digitalizacion y edicion
Octubre: Pruebas de impresión y prototipo
Noviembre-Diciembre: Crowdfunding y logistica de distribucion
Enero: Envío de productos
A coloring book? Really?
Coloring books are trending but for good reasons. Nowadays everything is digital and there is an obvious necessity to get away from that virtuality; to relax and just color like kids. Letting our imagination flow and take control is super fun and probably even necessary.
In my case, to illustrate is one of my passions. Being able to earn a living from it would be the best. The coloring books mix that passion with the user interaction. The books are not mine anymore and they become something different and unique for each one.
¿Un libro para colorear? ¿En serio?
Los libros para colorear están de moda, pero por buenas razones. En la actualidad todo es digital y es obvio que exista la necesidad de alejarnos de esa virtualidad, relajarnos un rato y sólo colorear como niños. Dejar que la imaginación tome control es muy divertido y probablemente hasta necesario.
En mi caso, ilustrar es una de mis mayores pasiones, poder vivir de ello sería lo mejor para mi. Los libros para colorear combinan esa pasión con la interacción de los usuarios. Los libros dejan de ser míos y se convierten en algo diferente y único para cada persona que los colorea.
Mermaid
   
  Postcards
  Fan Pack
  Artist poster
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The books will be printed by CreateSpace, the Amazon platform. This guarantees a very good and professional quality level by international standards. Every book comes packed in a hard cardboard envelope that avoids bending.

As every other project there are associated risks, in this case the main risk is shipping. Each shipment will have a tracking number and signature requirement. If there was any problem, I will communicate it individually, always prioritizing an on-time delivery.

In Europe and USA the books are going to be delivered by Amazon. Other rewards such as postcards and large prints, will be sent separately with their corresponding shipping price.

Los libros se imprimirán a través de CreateSpace, la plataforma oficial de Amazon, lo cual garantiza un nivel de calidad bastante bueno y profesional a nivel internacional. Todos los libros vienen empacados en cartón rígido para evitar dobladuras. 

Pero como en todo proyecto hay riesgos asociados, en este caso el mayor riesgo está relacionado con el tiempo de envío. Se utilizará correo con rastreo y firma para tener control sobre cada envío. 
Si hubiera algún problema con el envío se los comunicaré individualmente pero siempre priorizaré entregar a tiempo.

 En Europa y USA los libros se distribuirán a través de Amazon y el envío será gratis . Las demás recompensas se enviarán por separado con un precio de envío correspondiente


En la Ciudad de México habrá puntos de entrega para recoger tanto libros como recompensas. En el interior de la República Mexicana el envio se hará por líneas prepagadas de Fedex.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
This project's currency is MXN. When converting to USD, you will find that the numbers are much more lower than what it initially looks like!
Acerca del libro / The book
El libro es una celebración a los artesanos y a la artesanía mexicana: la creatividad de imaginar y plasmar sus costumbres y tradiciones en formas y colores, además de representar visiones, historias y relatos. También busca difundir su trabajo, acercando a chicos y grandes a las piezas que los artesanos hacen para conservar su identidad, a través de estas páginas para colorear.
This book is a celebration of Mexican artisans and their craft: the creativity to imagine and portray their traditions and customs in shapes and colors, to represent visions, histories, and tales. It is also a way to make the work done by them known outside of their own communities. Through these coloring pages we bring children and adults closer to the pieces that artisans create to preserve their identity.
"Artesanías para colorear" es un libro que contiene 30 imágenes de artesanías diferentes, que plasmaron los artesanos y que serán digitalizadas y trazadas en blanco y negro para que tú las puedas pintar, le des vida a las piezas y conozcas el trabajo que se hace en México. Detrás de cada página encontrarás la fotografía original de la artesanía, quién la hizo, y una pequeña historia de la misma.
The book has 30 different designs showcasing handcrafts. Originally crafted by the artisans, the designs were digitalized and traced in black and white so you can color them and bring the pieces to life, while getting to know the work done in Mexico. On the back of each page you’ll find a photo of the original craft on which the line drawing is based, as well as information about who made it, and a short history of that particular piece or technique.
  Frente y vuelta / Front and back
¿Por qué un libro para colorear? / Why a coloring book?
Colorear tiene muchos beneficios en la salud, es una actividad que te relaja y a la vez te concentra. Sirve para liberar el estrés y es algo que pueden hacer personas de cualquier edad. Además queremos generar una interacción con las artesanías, ya que estas fueron hechas a mano de la misma manera en que tu puedes colorear de nuevo las piezas. Dale vida a cada pieza con tú imaginación y elección de colores; y descubre la historia que hay detrás de cada pieza, el trabajo y el proceso que el artesano dedica a sus obras.
Coloring has diverse health benefits, it’s a relaxing activity that relieves stress and boosts your concentration abilities, ideal for people of all ages. Besides the positive impact on the body and mind, we’re building a bond with the crafts, as they were made by hand, the same way you can color again each piece.
Original, libro y coloreada / Original, book, and finished
El libro estará impreso en papel Bristol de 200gr, ideal para pintar con acuarelas, marcadores, crayolas, pluma o cualquier otro método que sea de tu agrado y está armado de forma tal que puedas desprender cada página y no tener que estar peleando con el resto de las páginas al pintar. Su tamaño es de 20 x 23 cm, por lo que lo puedes transportar, desprender y enmarcar o guardar. Cada página lleva detrás de ella la historia de la artesanía, todo está escrito en español e inglés.
The book will be printed on 200g Bristol paper, perfect for coloring with watercolors, markers, crayons, pens or any other technique you choose. Each 20cm x 23cm (7.8” x 9”) page is perforated for easy removal, so you can color the design more freely, color on the go, frame it or give your finished piece as a gift. Each page has the history of the handicraft in the back, all is written in English and Spanish.
  Nosotros / Us
Jorge Natera, estudié gestión cultural y mi trabajo se ha enfocado al rescate de las artesanías y su difusión. Desde hace dos años he hecho diferentes proyectos como videos, pláticas, imágenes y ahora por medio de este libro que te permite conocer el trabajo de los artesanos y ser parte de ellos. 
I’m Jorge Natera, Cultural Management graduate, I’ve focused my work on the support and preservation through dissemination of Mexican handcrafts. For the past two years I’ve done this in different projects and mediums like videos, talks, pictures, and now this coloring book that lets you learn about artisans and be part of them.
Soy Emilie Bernard, estudié diseño industrial y actualmente trabajo como fotógrafa documental (aquí puedes ver mi trabajo); siempre he apreciado la artesanía mexicana y he podido fotografiar a los artesanos y su obra. 
I’m Emilie Bernard, Industrial Design graduate, and documentary photographer (you can see my work here). I’ve always appreciated Mexican handcraft, and I’ve had the chance to photograph both the artisans and their craft. 
¿Cómo usaremos el dinero? / How we'll use the money?
El objetivo es recaudar $85,000 para poder producir el libro. El dinero lo vamos a destinar de la siguiente manera: *10% Kickstarter *40% Impresión *20% Envios *30% Producción y recompensas
Our goal is to raise $85,000 MXN for the production of the book. The money will be assigned as follows: 10% Kickstarter 40% printing 20% shipping 30% production and rewards
The budget
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Cualquier proyecto puede tener complicaciones, pero hemos buscado prevenir todo desde un principio. Nuestro impresor lleva 30 años trabajando en hacer libros, por lo que sabemos que será un trabajo excelente.
Los artesanos están muy contentos de poder mostrar sus piezas por lo cual no hay ningún problema en mostrar sus diseños.
Cualquier imprevisto que tengamos lo estaremos informando a la brevedad, pero no te preocupes ¡No pasará nada! ;)
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
¡¡Hola!!
Estamos felices de avisarles que las postales están listas para el envío, el día miércoles las mandaremos a todos aquellos que creyeron en nuestro proyecto y compraron esta recompensa.
Sobre el libro también tenemos noticias. Ya estamos a punto de mandar a imprimir. Ha sido más trabajo de lo que creíamos y nos apena habernos retrasado, pero estamos haciendo todo para que salga un libro de mucha calidad y lo tengan en el próximo mes.

Hola a todos!
Han pasado dos meses desde que la campaña se financió con éxito, han sido dos meses de mucha tarea en la computadora, sobre todo en la digitalización de las piezas. Este trabajo ha sido un poco más tardado de lo que teníamos en mente, sobre todo por haber algunas piezas con muchísimo detalle que tenemos que trazar. Es por eso que nos estamos extendiendo un poco en la impresión, y vamos a mandar a imprimir alrededor del día 20 de marzo.

Hace 30 minutos cerró el proyecto y hemos logrado la meta. Estamos totalmente agradecidos con cada uno de ustedes por ayudarnos a hacer este proyecto una realidad.
Pronto enviaremos las encuestas para recolectar información importante para el envío de los libros, además de tener buenas noticias ya que estamos contactando diferentes editoriales y tiendas para comercializar el libro el próximo año.

¡Hola a todos! Estamos a una semana de terminar la campaña y queremos agradecerles a todos su apoyo y su confianza.
Durante estos 30 días hemos tenido la fortuna de conocer grandes personas que estarán colaborando con nosotros por el gusto de hacer un mejor libro y llevarlo a más lugares de todo el mundo. También hemos visitado a más artesanos para ofrecer lo mejor de México.
Aún nos falta un poco para llegar a la meta, recuerden que pueden seguir compartiendo el link ->  o platicando a sus familiares y amigos sobre este proyecto.

Hello everyone! It's been two weeks since we started and we have the 60% of the total goal; This has been possible thanks to you! We are gratefully with each of you for your cooperation and for believe in the project.
Today we are going to be in a local radio station talking about the book, you can listen us at http://www.rmx.com.mx/ around 6.30pm (GTM -6)

updates.update_userinfo: Una semana para terminar / One more week
updates.update_content:
¡Woow! Han pasado 10 días desde que abrimos la campaña y con la gran noticia de que ya estamos muy cerca del 30% :D Sin lugar a dudas, esto no sería posible sin ustedes.
Además estamos felices porque el libro ha sido comprado en 6 países diferentes: México, Estados Unidos, España, Argentina, Colombia y Países Bajos. Podremos dar a conocer las artesanías mexicanas a más personas, llegar a diferentes lugares que sin su ayuda no lo hubiéramos imaginado

campaign.story:
THE PROJECT 
The funds we raise will used for the production, and post-production of an online documentary series about women in Mexican cuisine, tentatively entitled “Women in Cuisine.” 
The series consists of five 20-minute episodes. Each episode will tell the story of two women who work in fields related to Mexican cuisine. 
Mexico Food TV, the online channel dedicated to cuisine made and inspired in Mexico, produces the series. 
www.facebook.com/mexicofoodtv
THE TEAM 
Magaly Ugarte - Director 
A visual artist and director, she has produced movies and directed both a fictional and documentary online series. She was born in El Paso, Texas in 1988, it snowed the same day and an airplane crashed into a nearby shopping center (she likes to think it was an omen). Instagram @wagicmagic www.wagicmagic.tv 
Lilyana Torres – Director and Producer 
A maker of documentaries, she has worked on both Mexican, and international movie and television productions in recent years. She has eaten one avocado a day since she was 20 years old. 
Dani Anelisse – Photographer 
Her career began in still photography and now she’s getting into video photography. In her endless search for aesthetics she has found inspiration in different places, combining both disciplines. She was born in northern Mexico in 1988. Instagram @danianelisse
MEXICAN CUISINE IS FEMALE
 “Mexican cuisine has a sublimely female character… and it is an essential part of cultural heritage due to its vital collective values and strong identity.”
“Mexican cuisine is fundamentally female, it was, and is performed, maintained and passed on principally by women.”
THE SERIES 
“Women in Cuisine” is a five episode, online documentary series each episode being approximately 20 minutes long. Each episode will tell the story of two women who work in fields related to cuisine in Mexico.
Miwi Chef de Belmondo
  Perla de La esquina del chilaquil
WHAT WE’VE DONE SO FAR 
We embarked on this project a few months ago and began the pilot episode for this documentary series. Perla stars in this episode, the Blond, one of the owners of the renowned “Esquina del Chilaquil”, in the colony of Condesa, and Miwi, chef and owner of the “Belmondo” restaurant, in the colony of Roma. Mexico has many different kinds and styles of cuisine, therefore each episode will have a link between the characters that are depicted throughout the series. 
Episode 1. The Journey 
Miwi and Perla’s businesses are near each other and they share clients, but not culinary styles. Both women dedicate their lives to cuisine, one following her passion and the other continuing a family tradition.
Episode 2. Spaces 
 A collective of traditional cooks recover recipes from their ancestors on the Guerrero coast while a group of cloistered nuns prepare buñuelos (fritters/donuts) from a traditional recipe of the Saint Catherine of Siena Congregation in Mexico City. Although the spaces they share are antagonistic, they share the same mission, to preserve the recipes lost over time. 
Episode 3. Times 
 A young pastry chef begins her culinary career from her home and faces the difficulties of starting her own business, while, on the other hand, the 72 year old owner of a successful restaurant shares her experiences and the lessons she’s learned on how to keep a restaurant current. 
Episode 4. Earth and Asphalt 
 A Mexican cuisine writer and researcher lives on a self-sustainable farm in the state of Morelos, where no plastic or aluminum is used and everything is made from scratch. In parallel, a chef gives cooking classes in a juvenile shelter teaching the youths and their mothers. They both aim to raise awareness about the future of Mexican cuisine through teaching. 
Episode 5. Ritual 
 Two women work in collective food services. One caters movie and television productions and the other social events. Despite the differences in the each one’s planning and production processes, in both cases the modern ritual of eating in a group takes place.
Perla y su hija
WHAT WE WANT
We are looking to create a photo of a few women’s lives with this series using their experiences and stories in cuisine to capture the reality that many of us live in Mexico. Eating in Mexico isn’t just a biological act, because of its historical characteristics it has acquired a ceremonial feel, it is a ritual we celebrate in Mexico every day. That’s why we use cuisine as a unifying element in the lives of these women.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
One of the main risks is that we may not finish the series on time by next summer, since documentaries may last longer to edit that normal contents.

campaign.story:
This project's currency is MXN. When converting to USD, you will find that the numbers are much more lower than what it initially looks like!

PACIFICA Revista is a project that was born in early 2016, it’s a Bimonthly guide to entertainment, culture, art and lifestyle of Mexico City, all done by local experts who share the same passion for design and the city.
Our main goal is to attract and guide international tourists to Mexico City, we want to guide them through Mexico City like no one has ever done, we want them to fall in love with our TYPICAL food, our typical drinks, our favorite spots, we want them to roam the streets like a local, we want to tell them stories and share our experience and love for our culture.
https://pacificacdmx.wordpress.com/
https://www.facebook.com/pacificacdmx/
PACIFICA Revista es un proyecto que nació a principios del 2016, es una guía de entretenimiento, cultura, arte y lifestyle de la Ciudad de Mexico, hecha por expertos locales que comparten la misma pasión por el diseño y la ciudad.
Nuestro principal objetivo es atraer y orientar el turismo internacional, queremos guiarlos por la Ciudad de México como nunca nadie lo ha hecho. Queremos que conozcan y se enamoren de nuestra gastronomía típica, de nuestras bebidas típicas, nuestros spots favoritos, que recorran las calles como lo haría un local, queremos contarles historias y compartir nuestra experiencia y amor por nuestra cultura.
Issue #1
 After 3 digital and printed Issues distributed locally, we decided to take the risk and do something bigger, keeping the same essence and goals but this time with a worldwide impact. The objetive is to help our visitors enjoy our city and at the same time contribute to our community and local businesses in this difficult time for the country.
Specifications:
21 x 27 cm
70 Full Color Pages
Paper: 90g Recycle paper for pages, 120g Recycle paper for covers.
The Production of the magazine will be assigned to a local print shop and will be printed on 100% recycled paper, this way we contribute to the community and the local economy.
Después de 3 ejemplares digitales e impresos distribuidos localmente, decidimos arriesgarnos a hacer algo más grande, que mantenga la misma esencia, pero que esta vez tuviera impacto a nivel mundial. El objetivo es ayudar a nuestros visitantes a disfrutar mejor nuestra ciudad y al mismo tiempo contribuir con nuestra comunidad y con el comercio local en esta época tan difícil para el país.
Características:
21 x 27 cm 70 Páginas a color
Papel: Papel reciclado de 90g para interiores Papel reciclado de 120g para exteriores
La producción de la revista será asignada a una imprenta local y utilizaremos papel 100% reciclado, de esta manera, contribuimos con la comunidad y a la economía local.
   THE ONLINE PLATFORM
In our website you could find a list of museums, parks, restaurants, bars, events etc, this in order to show the large number of available activities, this will help you take the best decision. You could also find every issue and read some articles that will help you to enjoy your trip.
En nuestra página web podrás encontrar un listado de museos, parques, restaurantes, bares, eventos etc. Esto con la finalidad de mostrarte el gran numero de actividades disponibles, esto te ayudara a tomar la mejor decisión. También podrás descargar cada volumen y leer algunos artículos que te ayudaran a disfrutar de tu viaje.
   Why Kickstarter?
We strongly believe that collaboration is basic to grow as a society, so we want you to get involved, to believe in this project as we do and spread the word. We want the entire world to know our work and be the Official Mexico City Guide.
¿Por qué Kickstarter?
Creemos firmemente que la colaboración es basica para crecer como sociedad, por eso queremos que te involucres, que creas en este proyecto como nosotros lo hacemos y corras la voz. Queremos que conozcan nuestro trabajo en todo el mundo y ser la primera guia oficial de la Ciudad de México con alcance mundial.
Rewards
Carlos Vázquez Ruckstuhl Collection
  hand made wear by Mexican artisans
Credits
Video: Loosh Group (Marleo Ramos, Mario Ramos, Andrea Ramos)
Music: Tycho
Special thanks: Stephanie Díaz, Emmanuel Lopez, Armando Lepe, Melissa Hindle, Diego Esparza, Pulqueria La Nuclear.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have 3 printed Issues by now, but we know that there are external factors in the production or the team, which could delay the printing or distribution of our magazine, so we have done a research of logistics companies and printers to take the best decision. For the PACIFICA team everything is ready, so we hope to reach our goal to continue doing what we love.

Tenemos 3 ejemplares impresos, sabemos que existen factores externos a la produccion o al equipo de trabajo, que podrian retrasar la impresion o la distribucion de nuestra revista, por lo que nos hemos hecho un research de empresas de logistica e imprentas para tomar la major decision.
Por parte del equipo de PACIFICA todo esta listo, solo esperamos llegar a nuestra meta para continuar haciendo lo que mas amamos.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
¿QUÉ ES OMETEOTL? / WHAT IS OMETEOTL? 
El festival OMETEOTL, movimiento por la Música, el Espíritu, la Tierra y el Arte se realizara por 7ma. ocasión del 7 al 9 de abril de 2017 en el Estado de Morelos, MÉXICO.
El festival es logrado por la colaboración de un equipo dedicado en promover una nueva forma de reunión y celebración, buscamos unificar diferentes círculos sociales, tribus y culturas. Procuramos armonizar las antiguas tradiciones y costumbres con la cultura y arte contemporáneo. Nuestro objetivo es enviar un mensaje de unión y armonía a los asistentes contribuyendo en lograr una mejor relación con nosotros mismos, con nuestros semejantes, con la naturaleza y con todo aquello que nos rodea. 
Ahó!
_________________
The OMETEOTL festival, movement Music, Spirit, Earth and Art will be held for the 7th. time from April 7th to the 9th 2017 in the State of Morelos, MEXICO.
The festival is accomplished by the collaboration of a team dedicated to promoting a new way of meeting and celebratio. We seek to unify different social circles, tribes and cultures. We seek to harmonize the ancient traditions and customs with the culture and contemporary art. Our goal is to send a message of unity and harmony to attendees helping to achieve a better relationship with ourselves, with our fellow humans, with nature and with everything around us.
Ahó!
  El festival presenta más de 60 actos musicales en vivo y un amplio programa de actividades relacionados con Espiritualidad, Ecología y Arte donde participan guardianes y representantes de distintas tradiciones, artistas, y colaboradores especialistas que ofrecerán al público talleres, pláticas, demostraciones y exposiciones en estos temas. Además de Ceremonias, Temazcales, Fuego Sagrado, Galería de Arte Visionario y Altares, entre otros. OMETEOTL ofrece un espacio a las culturas mas representativas de México y el mundo para mantener vivo el espíritu de nuestras tradiciones.
______________________
The festival features more than 60 musical acts. There will  extensive programs of activities related to Spirituality, Ecology and Art where guardians and representatives of different traditions, artists and specialties provide the public with workshops, lectures, demonstrations and exhibitions for everyone to participate. Besides Ceremonies, Temazcales, Holy Fire, Visionary Art Gallery and Altares, among others. OMETEOTL offers space to the most representative cultures of Mexico and the world to keep alive the spirit of our traditions.
  OMETEOTL es pionero en implementar iniciativas para realizar un festival ecológicamente responsable, las estructuras del festival son creadas con técnicas de bio-construcción con bambú y materiales certificados.
_____________
OMETEOTL is a pioneer in implementing initiatives for an environmentally responsible festival, festival structures are created with techniques of bio-construction with bamboo and certified materials.
¿QUÉ SIGUE AHORA? / WHAT'S NEXT? 
OMETEOTL nunca ha recibido, ni recibirá el apoyo de ninguna marca de consumo. El agua es gratuita en el festival para todos los asistentes. Contamos con la participación de stands de bebidas y comida que solo ofrecen opciones vegetarianas Y/O orgánicas. Los alimentos solo pueden servirse en materiales compostables. El festival solo genera 3 tipos de basura y todos los residuos son reciclados de forma correcta.
_________________
OMETEOTL has never received  support from any consumer brand. Water is free at the festival for all participants. We have the participation of drinks and food stands that offer only vegetarian and / or organic options. Food can only be served in compostable materials. The festival only generates 3 types of garbage and all waste is recycled properly.
     Que la paz prevalezca en la tierra. TLAZOCAMATI
_______________
May peace prevail on earth.
TLAZOCAMATI

campaign.story:
La primera colección txt.ure / First txt.ure collection
After one year with txt.ure and three years working within the community of tule weavers in San Pedro Tultepec, we want to revive the pre-Hispanic technique that creates our fantastic furniture by building the first tule-weaving workshop in the area. Within this workshop, we will focus on preserving this technique through the education and training of new artisans.
txt.ure is a project of Collaborative Design with a social connotation. Therefore, we want to invest in a solid infrastructure that would allow us to positively influence the community of artisans, left behind by development since the ‘70s. In San Pedro Tultepec, only two families that know this weaving technique are left. As a collaborative project, we want to intervene and build the workshop at the Morales family's home, investing in their heritage, adapting their spaces, and hence, enhancing the quality of life for our artisans and our production capacity.
/
Después de un año con txt.ure y tres años de trabajar dentro de la comunidad de tejedores en Tule en San Pedro Tultepec, queremos re-dinamizar la técnica prehispánica que construye nuestros fantásticos muebles, al construir el primer taller de tejido de tule de la zona. Dentro de el, nos dedicaremos a preservar la técnica a partir de la educación y entrenamiento de nuevos artesanos.
txt.ure es un proyecto de Diseño Colaborativo de corte social. Es por eso, que queremos invertir en una infraestructura sólida que nos permita impactar a la comunidad de artesanos, rezagadas por el desarrollo desde la década de los setenta. En San Pedro Tultepec, quedan tan sólo dos familias que conocen la técnica del tejido. Como proyecto colaborativo, queremos intervenir y construir el taller en la casa de la familia Morales. Invertir en su patrimonio, adecuar sus espacios y elevar así, la calidad de vida de nuestro artesanado y elevamos nuestra capacidad de producción.
Weaved details of the stool / Detalles tejidos del taburete
Preserving the technique
Nacho Morales, master craftsman / maestro artesano Nacho Morales, master craftsman / maestro artesano 
Nacho Morales, master craftsman / maestro artesano
Once we complete the improvements of the Morales family's home and our workspace (there is not enough space for us at Don Nacho's house anymore!), we will start training new apprentices. All of us within txt.ure carry out fair economic practices, which allows us to work within a well-being economy that we want to share and expand. The key word within our practice: EDUCATION of the artisans.
With your funding, we will be able to build a 750-square-foot workshop, 100% dedicated to the production and creation of pieces made with tule (an endemic material of the area).
This new small building will be equipped with:
1. Workshop space
2. Materials storage unit (capable of storing three months’ worth of supplies)
3. Drying room for the pieces
4. Open area to fumigate furniture
5. Production room 6. Sales shop, to sell the family's artisanal products
7. We will improve the habitability of the Morales home, building two rooms for their children who currently don't have their own private spaces.
The workshop will have the capability of storing rain water, to recycle it for their daily activities and to be environmentally sustainable.
/
Una vez resueltas las mejorías en la vivienda de la familia Morales y nuestro espacio de trabajo (¡ya no cabemos en la casa de Don Nacho!) comenzaremos el entrenamiento de nuevos aprendices. Todos dentro de txt.ure llevamos a cabo prácticas económicas justas, lo que nos tiene trabajando dentro de una economía de bienestar que queremos compartir y expander. La palabra clave dentro de nuestra práctica: EDUCACIÓN del artesanado.
Con tu apoyo, podremos construir un taller de 230 m2 dedicado 100% a la producción y experimentación de piezas construidas en tule (material endémico de la zona). Este pequeño nuevo edificio, estará equipado con:
1. Espacio de taller
 2. Bodega de material (capaz de almacenar los insumos de 3 meses)
 3. Cuarto de secado de las piezas
4. Área abierta para la fumigación de los muebles
5. Bodega de producción
6. Local comercial para la venta de los productos artesanales de su familia
7. Mejoraremos la habitabilidad de la casa de los Morales construyendo dos habitaciones para sus hijos que actualmente no cuentan con espacios privados propios.
El taller tendrá la capacidad de captar el agua de la lluvia para poderla reciclar dentro del uso diario.
We thank Luteca very much, a platform dedicated to promoting contemporary and modern design around the world. Luteca is constantly investing in our infrastructure because they believe in our mission. Although it's not yet enough to support our social infrastructure, it is thanks to them that we now export our pieces. This was our great achievement in 2016!
Thank you for helping us preserve the cultural richness of México!
If we successfully reach our goal, the first stone will be set in January 2017. We will finish in May 2017.
/
Estamos muy agradecidos con Luteca, plataforma dedicada a la promoción de diseño moderno y contemporáneo en el mundo. Luteca invierte constantemente en nuestra infraestructura porque creen en nuestra misión. Aunque no es suficiente para soportar todavía nuestra infraestructura social, es gracias a ellos que ahora exportamos nuestras piezas. ¡Ese fue nuestro gran logro del 2016!
Ahora más que nunca, es importante ayudar a nuestras comunidades, apoyar economías locales. El trabajo de estos artesanos es inigualable y merecen ser reconocidos por su trabajo que luchan contra los modelos industriales de desarrollo. Sólo nos falta de tu apoyo para hacer de esto una realidad generando comunidad, colaboración y la solidaridad a través del Diseño.
¡Gracias por ayudarnos a preservar la riqueza cultural de México!
Si logramos exitosamente la meta, la primera piedra se podrá en enero del 2017. Concluiremos en mayo del 2017.
----
Now... / Ahora ...
Thanks a lot! / ¡ Muchas gracias!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We've made progress with the architectural proposal, already having a conceptual design and the structural approval of the design of our desired new workspace. The only thing we're missing is your help!

/

Tenemos avanzada la propuesta arquitectónica ya con un conceptual y la aprobación estructural del diseño de nuestro deseado nuevo espacio de trabajo. ¡Lo único que nos falta es de tu ayuda para que este sueño se convierta en una realidad!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: Historia del txt01 / History of txt01
support.descp:
¿Sabías que este tipo de asientos tiene más de 600 años de antigüedad? Conoce por qué están a punto de desaparecer y cómo lo hemos re-diseñado para llegar a ser una pieza de diseño artesanal, como nos gusta reconocer al txt01 actualmente.
/
Did you know that this type of seat is more than 600 years old? Find out why they are about to disappear and how we have redesigned it to make it into an artisanal piece, which we now like to call txt01.

updates.update_content:
Dear backers,
We started 2018 with the best of news!
After 2 months, we have finished the construction of our workshop. Now, we will take care on those, never ending details.
Thanks to all of our supporters, 5 artisans + our team will use this space to produce our powerful furniture, using a technique inherited from pre-Hispanic times.

updates.update_userinfo: Laying the first stone for txt.ure's workshop
updates.update_content:
Dear backers,
We are very excited to share this news with us. After a couple of months of working on legal, structural, architectural and production issues, we officially laid the first stone for txt.ure's workshop!
The architectural project will be in charge of the young Architecture office, Studio Ardavia, led by Architect Alejandra Robles. The workshop will have a dimension of almost 80 m2, equipped with facilities for learning / making furniture, drying the pieces, fumigation, material storage, bathroom, and at the same time, improvements will be made to the existing house of Master Craftsman, Nacho Morales. The design and its construction are based on the industrial architecture that camouflages with its surroundings, very common of the Valley of Toluca.

Dear backers,
We're very happy to announce that after three and a half months of practicing the technique of tule-working, producing almost 45 stools, Cornelio Osorio's pieces have achieved the quality to represent our work all over the world.
We're very excited to share this news with you. We've been tirelessly working to spread this technique to other hands in San Pedro Tultepec. Now, our mission is to encourage the town's younger generation to join us in making these fascinating pieces.


txt.ure

Dear backers, 
During these past couple of months but we have been organising legal terms and polishing the architectural design with Iñaki Echeverría's team before getting ready to lay the first stone. Simultaneously we have also been teaching and learning from our new apprentices on the tabouret making process.
From now on, we will be publishing regular updates until the construction of ADN Workshop is concluded. We want to launchof our website with a big thank you to all the donors that made this possible. <3

7 days to go and people are still backing the project.
We will like to thank each one of you individually for backing our project.

With every additional donation we want to be able to perfect this project to the best of our ability. We hope to make it the best that it can be.

With love,
txt.ure team

Dear backers,
We did it! We reached 100%! We are so incredibly grateful to everyone who has pitched in to help in the realisation of our goal, our shared belief in this project paid off and now we will be one step closer to preserving this artful technique of furniture-making from extinction! 
However, we have more the 1 week left and every additional donation will help us perfect this project to the best of our ability.

A lot of good things happened since the campaign has been running.  
We would like to thank you all 114 backers for believing in the project and press (Wired Italy, Designaholic, Leanluxe, Design Week Mexico & more) that has helped us sharing our mission!
Without you we wouldn't reach the first half.

We are still working to make this a reality. But we need more voices spreading the word. Thanks for your support! Every action means a lot for us. Let's keep sharing & creating community.

Dear backers,
We are very happy to announce an exciting news for the project. The architectural firm, Iñaki Echeverria, is supporting the campaign by giving the design of the workshop!
The architecture studio based in Mexico City, has a multidisciplinary focus which provides unique, specific solutions to complex conditions, in everything from recovery projects, environmental remediation and territorial strategies to landscape & urban design, architecture and project production.
